markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Come at Me!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3198) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Pistolero's Challenge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3174)

</column>

---

You're a legendary duelist, welcoming all challengers, enabling you to challenge many foes even while other challenges are active. There is no longer a limit to the number of Pistolero's Challenges you can have in effect at one time.
name: Come at Me!

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Come at Me! Source Guns & Gears pg. 117 2.0 Prerequisites Pistolero's Challenge --- You're a legendary duelist, welcoming all challengers, enabling you to challenge many foes even while other challenges are active. There is no longer a limit to the number of Pistolero's Challenges you can have in effect at one time.
